document.full_text: the only thing worse than a lack of offensive movement is superfluous offensive movement, and that's what the knicks had when they tried to free amar'e stoudemire against boston with screens 30 feet from the hoop.
document.title: knicks run out of tricks against boston
lines_and_colors: the only thing worse than a lack of offensive movement is superfluous offensive movement, and that's what the knicks had when they tried to free amar'e stoudemire against boston with screens 30 feet from the hoop.
